name: Race for the Galaxy
description: Explore, Settle, Develop, Trade, Consume, or Produce? Which do you need most? Which of Earth's former colonies will be most successful at settling the galaxy, now that JumpDrive exists? Who will discover the secrets of the mysteriously vanished Alien Overlords? Your goal: to build the most prosperous and powerful space empire!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent Memory: 256 MB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 100 MB available space
